title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SpeechContext
name: SpeechContext
description:
Hints for the speech recognizer to help with recognition in a specific conversation state.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SpeechContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.phrases
params.description: Optional. A list of strings containing words and phrases that the speech recognizer should recognize with higher likelihood. This list can be used to: improve accuracy for words and phrases you expect the user to say, e.g. typical commands for your Dialogflow agent add additional words to the speech recognizer vocabulary * ... See the Cloud Speech documentation for usage limits.

params.name: data.boost
params.description: Optional. Boost for this context compared to other contexts: If the boost is positive, Dialogflow will increase the probability that the phrases in this context are recognized over similar sounding phrases. If the boost is unspecified or non-positive, Dialogflow will not apply any boost. Dialogflow recommends that you use boosts in the range (0, 20] and that you find a value that fits your use case with binary search.

methods.name: getPhrases
methods.description:
Optional. A list of strings containing words and phrases that the speech recognizer should recognize with higher likelihood.

This list can be used to:

  • improve accuracy for words and phrases you expect the user to say, e.g. typical commands for your Dialogflow agent
  • add additional words to the speech recognizer vocabulary
  • ... See the Cloud Speech documentation for usage limits.

methods.name: getBoost
methods.description:
Optional. Boost for this context compared to other contexts:

  • If the boost is positive, Dialogflow will increase the probability that the phrases in this context are recognized over similar sounding phrases.

  • If the boost is unspecified or non-positive, Dialogflow will not apply any boost. Dialogflow recommends that you use boosts in the range (0, 20] and that you find a value that fits your use case with binary search.
